problem_type: Student selects the explanation that shows conceptual understanding of why b/b = 1

prompt: Explain why 4/4 is the same as one whole.
options: We have all the parts, so it makes a complete whole
Because 4 is an even number
Because the numbers match
Because it comes after 3/4

problem_type: Student selects the explanation that shows conceptual understanding of why b/b = 1

action_description: Student selects one explanation from multiple choice options.
prompt: Select the best explanation for why 6/6 = 1.
options: 6 parts out of 6 total—that's all of them, which is 1 whole
